subject: Security alert for your linked account
body: A new sign-in was detected on a device. If this was you, no action is needed. If not, please secure your account immediately.

subject: 🔥 50% off all summer items!
body: Don't miss out on our biggest sale of the season! Everything must go. Click here to shop now and save big on all your summer favorites.

subject: Project Update
body:
Hi team,

Just wanted to give a quick update on the project timeline. We are currently on track to meet the Q3 deadline.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks,
Jane

subject: New Opportunity: Software Developer at TechCorp
body: We came across your profile and were very impressed with your experience. We have an opening for a Senior Software Developer that seems like a perfect fit. Would you be open to a quick chat next week?

subject: Congratulations! You have won!
body: You have been selected as the lucky winner of our grand prize of $2,000,000. To claim your prize, please provide your bank details and a small processing fee.

subject: Assignment last date submit
body:
Hey buddy,

Today is the last date to submit the assignment of machine learning. So
Don't miss the date.
